total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the locations of the number 1 in the input grid.
Q2: For each location of 1, draw a vertical line of 1s from the top to the bottom of the grid.
Q3: For each location of 1, draw a horizontal line of 1s from the left to the right of the grid.
Q4: Identify the intersections of the vertical and horizontal lines of 1s.
Q5: Change the number at the intersections to 2.
Q6: Identify the locations that are adjacent to the number 2 (up, down, left, right).
Q7: Change the number at these locations to 3.
